thing-type.label: Bambu Lab Printer
thing-type.description: Represents a Bambu Lab 3D printer connected via MQTT

channel.label: Nozzle Temperature
channel.description: Current temperature of the nozzle.

channel.label: Nozzle Target Temperature
channel.description: Target temperature of the nozzle.

channel.label: Bed Temperature
channel.description: Current temperature of the heated bed.

channel.label: Bed Target Temperature
channel.description: Target temperature of the heated bed.

channel.label: Chamber Temperature
channel.description: Current temperature inside the printer chamber.

channel.label: Print Stage
channel.description: Current stage of the print process.

channel.label: Print Progress
channel.description: Percentage of the print completed.

channel.label: Remaining Print Time
channel.description: Estimated time remaining for the print in seconds.

channel.label: WiFi Signal Strength
channel.description: Current WiFi signal strength.

channel.label: Printer Command
channel.description: Current command being executed by the printer.

channel.label: Message Code
channel.description: Message code from the printer.

channel.label: Sequence ID
channel.description: Unique sequence identifier for commands.

channel.label: Upgrade State
channel.description: Current state of the printer firmware upgrade.

channel.label: IP Camera
channel.description: IP camera details of the printer.

channel.label: XCam
channel.description: XCam details of the printer.

channel.label: Upload
channel.description: Upload status details.

channel.label: Network
channel.description: Network configuration and info.

channel.label: IP Camera Device
channel.description: IP camera device associated with the printer.

channel.label: Buildplate Marker Detector
channel.description: Indicates if the buildplate marker detection is enabled.

channel.label: Upload Status
channel.description: Current file upload status.

channel.label: Upload Progress
channel.description: File upload progress percentage.

channel.label: Upload Message
channel.description: Message related to the upload status.

channel.label: Network Configuration
channel.description: Configuration settings of the printer network.

channel.label: IP Camera Record
channel.description: Current recording status of the IP camera.

channel.label: Timelapse
channel.description: Status of the timelapse recording.

channel.label: Camera Resolution
channel.description: Resolution of the IP camera.

channel.label: Tutk Server
channel.description: Tutk server details for IP camera.

channel.label: Mode Bits
channel.description: Mode bits setting of the IP camera.

parameter.name: serial
parameter.label: Serial Number
parameter.description: Unique serial number of the printer.

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Hostname
parameter.description: IP address of the printer or `us.mqtt.bambulab.com` for cloud mode.

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: `bblp` for local mode or your Bambu Lab user (starts with `u_`).

parameter.name: accessCode
parameter.label: Access Code
parameter.description: Access code of the printer. The method of obtaining it differs for local and cloud modes.
